title: Create English learning conversation app with AI robot

requirements.text: Create a child-friendly robot character interface that serves as the conversation partner, with visual elements appropriate for young English learners

quotes: children can talk to an English robot

acceptanceCriteria: Robot character is visually displayed on screen
Design is age-appropriate and welcoming for children
Robot has a distinct visual identity that supports the learning context

requirements.text: Implement voice input functionality allowing children to speak English phrases or sentences to the robot

quotes: children can talk to an English robot

acceptanceCriteria: Children can activate voice recording through the interface
Spoken audio is captured and converted to text
Voice input works reliably for child speech patterns

requirements.text: Create backend logic to analyze spoken English input for grammar mistakes, pronunciation errors, and language inaccuracies
acceptanceCriteria: System identifies grammatical errors in user input
Analysis results are returned in a structured format

requirements.text: Display correction feedback from the robot in a clear, encouraging manner that explains mistakes without discouraging the child learner
acceptanceCriteria: Corrections are presented in child-friendly language
Feedback highlights the mistake and provides the correct form
Tone is educational and supportive rather than critical

requirements.text: Implement conversation flow where the robot responds to the child's input, providing both corrections and continuing the dialogue naturally

quotes: children can talk to an English robot

acceptanceCriteria: Robot provides conversational responses after each user input
Dialogue feels natural and maintains context
Corrections are integrated into the conversational flow

requirements.text: Apply a playful, educational design theme with bright colors, friendly typography, and an engaging layout that appeals to children while maintaining readability and usability
acceptanceCriteria: Visual design is cohesive across all screens
Color palette is vibrant and age-appropriate
Layout supports easy navigation for young users

constraints: Voice input must be processed through frontend browser APIs without requiring external third-party speech services
All conversation and correction logic must be implemented in the Motoko backend actor

required: Friendly cartoon robot character with large expressive eyes and a welcoming smile, suitable for children's educational app (robot-character.dim_512x512.png)
